title: THIS IS WHY YOU WANT A SNOW PUSHER. #tractors #snowremoval #madeincanada

tasks.task: Operate a tractor with a snow removal attachment.
subtasks: Attach the HLA pusher to the tractor.
Position the tractor and pusher to clear snow.
Drive the tractor forward to push snow.
Maneuver the pusher to direct snow away from objects.
Replace wear parts on the pusher.
